title: Permission Groups
description: Manage all permission groups, including adding, deleting, and editing operations.

form.name: Group Name
form.nameDescription: Group name is used to identify different user groups, it's recommended to use meaningful names.
form.editDescription: Modify group information, changes will take effect immediately.
form.createDescription: Create a new permission group to assign different permissions to different users.

messages.deleteDescription: This action will permanently delete this permission group and cannot be recovered. Are you sure you want to continue?

nameValidation.min: Group name must be at least 2 characters
nameValidation.pattern: Group name can only contain letters, numbers, Chinese characters, underscores and hyphens
